message.content:
Here is the healthy meal plan for you that doesn’t contain any of the mentioned food allergies:

Breakfast: 
- Fresh fruit smoothie with banana, mango, and berries. (Blend it without using any dairy products)
- Whole grain toast with avocado spread (Use almond milk instead of cow’s milk for the smoothie)
- Green tea or herbal tea.

Lunch: 
- Grilled chicken breast with lemon and herbs
- Steamed vegetables like carrots, broccoli, bell peppers, and zucchini
- Quinoa or brown rice (Use olive oil for cooking)
- Mixed green salad with cherry tomatoes, cucumber, olives, and balsamic dressing (Avoid any dressing containing honey).

Dinner: 
- Baked salmon with lemon and herbs
- Roasted sweet potato wedges
- Steamed vegetables like asparagus, green beans, and snow peas
- Stir-fried mixed vegetables without garlic or cashews. (Use coconut milk for the curry).

Snacks:
- Apple slices with almond butter (Avoid all nuts except apples)
- Celery sticks with hummus (Choose a brand without garlic).

Remember to drink plenty of water throughout the day and stay hydrated. It’s always recommended to consult your doctor or dietician before making any changes to your diet.
